definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to listen/to hear/to obey/a can (loanword from English "tin")/classifier for canned beverages
(literary pronunciation, still advocated in Taiwan) to rule/to sentence/to allow

sentences.english: Can you pick up London on the radio?
sentences.chinese: 你的收音机能收听到伦敦的电台吗？

sentences.english: So, apps such as Pandora internet radio can be listened to while reading the news using another app.
sentences.chinese: 例如你在阅读新闻的时候同时收听潘朵拉网络广播。

sentences.english: Stay tuned to this channel for the latest news from Washington.
sentences.chinese: 继续收听这个台以关注来自华盛顿的最新消息。

sentences.english: That night I listened to a call-in program on the radio;
sentences.chinese: 那天夜里我收听了广播电台的采访节目。

sentences.english: About a minute later, the sound is picked up by a microphone suspended under the receiving ship.
sentences.chinese: 约一分钟后，吊在接收船下的传声器收听到这一声音。

sentences.english: Listen to information on the radio and find out what is happening.
sentences.chinese: 收听广播信息，了解目前状况。

sentences.english: That means some people like to keep it on for hours.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着有些人喜欢好几个小时地收听网络电台。

sentences.english: Listen to the next exciting episode tomorrow night.
sentences.chinese: 请于明晚继续收听下一集的精彩节目。

sentences.english: Turn on radio and listen for instructions from public safety agencies.
sentences.chinese: 打开收音机，收听公共安全机构发出的指导。

sentences.english: Letters have been coming in from everybody who heard the news on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 收听到这一新闻的人都纷纷来信。

sentences.english: The size of the unduplicated audience that listens exclusively to one station within some specified period.
sentences.chinese: 在特定时段内只收听某电台的非重叠听众总量。

sentences.english: It's that time of the week again. Welcome to English World. This is your friend Mark.
sentences.chinese: 马可老师和郭文洁我再次欢迎你收听英语世界。

sentences.english: My radio can pick up BBC very clearly.
sentences.chinese: 我的收音机能清楚地收听到BBC。

sentences.english: I listened to the music on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我收听广播中播放的音乐。

sentences.english: Vary the programmes you listen to.
Good ratings gave the programme the kiss of life.
sentences.chinese: 良好的收听率拯救了这个节目。

definition: to broadcast a lecture, a book reading etc
audiobook/recording of a person reading the text of a book
broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize
lit. Even if we don't see each other, don't give up and leave (idiom)/fig. Be sure to wait!/See you there!
regular column or segment (in a publication or broadcast program)/program (TV or radio)
